# SearchableQueryExtensions.WhereSearchable&lt;T,U&gt; method

Find all entities matching the provided keywords.

```csharp
public static IQueryable<T> WhereSearchable<T, U>(this DbSet<T> dbSet, 
    Expression<Func<T, U>> propertyAccessor, params string[] keywords)
    where T : class
```
